title: Cuore magazine logo font - help needed!
content:
Saw this whilst on holiday in Spain.....can’t find it in myfonts etc.

Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011041im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cuorepelos_5788.gif)

 [‹ From The Basement logo font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011041/http:/typophile.com/node/48223 "Go to previous forum topic") [A curly one... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011041/http:/typophile.com/node/48356 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dobrie

comments.content: Fattened up Chalet by House Industries.

Yep. [Chalet New York 1970](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011041/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/house_industries/chalet_new_york_1970/?sample_text=cuore%20pelos&sample_size=60) to be exact.
